MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G33 postcode area of Stepps. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.26pm to safely carry out repairs to our underground network and this may affect the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.04AM on 23rd November 2020.
